DOC.brief_summary: A 14-Week clinical research study compare effectiveness safety ropinirole placebo ( inactive sugar pill ) treatment patient Restless Legs Syndrome ( RLS ) United States .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Research Study Testing Ropinirole Treatment Restless Legs Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients diagnose Restless Legs Syndrome ( RLS ) symptom : uncomfortable `` creepycrawly '' sensation legs , overwhelm urge move leg relieve sensation , sensation go away move legs , trouble fall asleep stay asleep symptom . Patients must give write informed consent prior specific study procedure . Exclusion criterion : Patients suffer narcolepsy , sleep terror disorder , sleepwalk disorder , breathe related sleep disorder . Patients diagnose renal failure ( endstage renal disease ) iron deficient anemia pregnancy . Patients suffer movement disorder ( i.e . Parkinson 's Disease ) . Patients medical condition diabetes , peripheral neuropathy , rheumatoid arthritis , fibromyalgia syndrome . Participation clinical drug device trial last three month . Other inclusion exclusion criterion evaluate physician .
